function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact and airborne particles due to close proximity in densely populated living spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion leading to potential outbreak and spread of diseases within the community.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, using face masks, and improving ventilation systems in buildings.","Technologies":"Smart air purifiers, HVAC systems, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Residents of densely populated areas, especially those living in shared accommodation or high-rise buildings.","Owner":"Local health authorities, building management companies, and individual residents."},{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared communal spaces and contact with commonly touched surfaces.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission within the community due to shared amenities and facilities.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of communal areas, promoting hand hygiene, and providing hand sanitizing stations.","Technologies":"Touchless fixtures, UV-C disinfection systems, and antimicrobial coatings for surfaces.","People":"Residents of apartment complexes, shared offices, and communal living spaces.","Owner":"Building management companies, facility managers, and cleaning service providers."}]}
